comments:
Create an SWT Application and change its layout to FillLayout.
In the source, change the layout to RowLayout.  RowLayout won't be imported, so
it'll be an error.  The exception below occurs when this is done.  Adding the
import through code assist clears the java error, but the property sheet does
not update to reflect the new layout.


!ENTRY org.eclipse.ve.java.core 4 0 Sep 01, 2004 20:02:54.293
!MESSAGE Exception thrown.
!STACK 0

work with Sri on this one.

Besides the fact that the decoder NPEed because it coudl not resolve the
RowLayout, the snippet anaylisys update the CodeGen expression with the latest
content... so when you fixed the import ... it did not see any changes int he
expression, and hence did not reDecode it.

Now, during a merge, if the decoder fails... we will not update the CodeGen
expression's content... so any future snippet anayises will see the delta, and
the decoder will attemp to reDecode it.
Now that 1.0 is released, marking as verified.
Now that 1.0 is released, marking as closed.
